data.details:
Are you a dynamic individual looking to enhance your outdoor skills? We have a course for you! Join us at North Fork and learn how to navigate our unique our low ropes Challenge Course.

Our unique Challenge Course consists of 11 low ropes elements designed to foster individual growth and group development. Whether walking a tightrope, achieving balance using a board, or negotiating through our challenging spider web; you will gain valuable communication techniques while enhancing your team-building skills. Youâ€™ll have the incredible opportunity to learn about group dynamics, improve your trust in others, and develop problem solving techniques to effectively communicate and lead a group.

Special Instructions:
Participants are kindly asked to volunteer for at least one Council event per year.
Dress for the weather and wear closed toe, flat shoes (no heels).
Adult members should currently possess or be willing to obtain an approved First Aid/CPR/ AED certification.
Please bring a sack lunch and water bottle to this session.

Rate: $0.00

Last day to register online is Wed. Jan 14, 2015.
data.locationLabel: NFLC Arts Village Program Shelter B
